title: Textile, 19th cenutry
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: relief printed on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 63.5 x 87.5 cm (25 in. x 34 7/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 17.8 x 17.1 cm (7 in. x 6 3/4 in.)
description:
All-over pattern of a group of small scale flowers in a landscape-like setting. Colors predominately red and green on an ivory background. 
Half-drop repeat - minimum unit 7" high x 6 3/4"
Technique : Relief print on plain weave fabric

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th cenutry.
19th cenutry. Medium: cotton
Technique: relief printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Benjamin Ginsburg. 1973-46-8.
